title: How many message can be stored in phone？
answer:
1. The captivity of message up to the phone memory space, the more space, and the more messages can be support. We can check the phone memory in the below way: 

 Main menu-„³setting„³storage Setting--„³Available space 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926085138444001.png)

 2. Every thread can support 999 messages; Phone memory can store 200 by default   
 Setting method¡GMenu„³Setting„³General

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926085214557001.png)
